alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 5:44PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of Alamosa, southeastern Rio Grande, southeastern Saguache and northwestern Costilla Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 544 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mosca, or near Alamosa, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mosca around 555 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hooper. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft
